fullText:
Power Cascade

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Psion
Benefit: When you hit an enemy with a daily psion attack power, your next attack against that enemy made before the end of your next turn using an unaugmented psion attack power deals 1d6 extra force or psychic damage.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 133.
name: Power Cascade
benefit: When you hit an enemy with a daily psion attack power, your next attack against that enemy made before the end of your next turn using an unaugmented psion attack power deals 1d6 extra force or psychic damage.
